text: The original scheme was planned to provide short refresher courses at the ages of fifty-five and sixty: the first of these is due in 1963. Meanwhile, each 'graduate' is encouraged to seek help and advice in working out his ideas, either through the company's personnel department or by an approach to members of the panel responsible for the scheme.
handwritten_text: The original scheme was planned to provide short refresher courses at the ages of fifty-five and sixty: the first of these is due in 1963. Meanwhile, each 'graduate' is encouraged to seek help and advice in working out his ideas, either through the company's personnel department or by an approach to members of the panel responsible for the scheme.
